message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split fairly reflects the fact that we both stand to lose if we keep going.
Alice, your offer was too low. Let's be realistic - the longer this takes, the less we both get. This is a fair offer.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I need a bit more to agree. This offer ensures we both lose less to inflation.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point. Let's end this before we lose even more.
